author: Staff Reporter
text:
Legal awareness camp for tribal people was held in Jamunamarathur in Jawadu Hills. District Legal Services Authority and Polur Taluk Legal Services Authority jointly organised the programme on Saturday. Chief Judicial Magistrate Naraaja presided over the event. Jamunamarathur Panchayat President Tamilselvi Ramajayam delivered the welcome address.

Subordinate Judge Swarnam J.Natarajan and Polur taluk legal services authority president Mohammed Rizwanulla Sherif were among those spoke.
title: Legal awareness camp for tribals
